test.name: TC01 Validate Browser Navigation of NDTV Main Page

kw.name: Open NDTV Main Page
kw.doc: Keyword used to open NDTV URL and validate the page element

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Assert This Page Is NDTV Main Page
kw.doc: Check whether the current page is the NDTV Main Page with its title

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Image
kw.doc: Verifies image identified by ``locator`` is found from current page.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
